features: 【SpeedTalk SIM】Ushining Senior cell phone come with a SpeedTalk SIM Card, minimum cost only $5 per month, option for Port-in(Keep) your existing phone number or get a new phone number.

【Simple Operating System 】USHINING 4G senior cell phone, easy to use operation system, big menu icon, large font, high volume and high-definition loudspeakers, Built-in audio, video, Bluetooth, External FM audio, calculators, alarm clocks, calendars, and it can store up to 500 phone book entries. Equipped with a charging dock, very convenient for the elderly to charge the phone.

【Exclusive for The Elderly】30M Powerful flashlight, large and clear buttons, easy to make phone call for those seniors with inflexible hands; Φ20*30 Box speaker, amplifying speakerphone maximum volume up to 110 dB. 2.4 inch landscape screen, large menu icon, easy viewing for seniors; 5 language: English, German, Spanish, French and Italian.

【SOS Function】this senior feature phone has SOS button on the rear cover, setting 5 emergency contacts, allowing you immediately dialing to a preferred contact number in case of an emergency. Ideal for older people, children or people with disabilities.

【Upgraded Endurable Battery 】1000mAh batteries provide greater battery capacity than any other products of its kind. Low power consumption, Its talk time can last 5-6 hours and standby time of 100 hours (4 days). With a safe and high quality of electric core of A, it has incredible battery life, faster charging speed and safer charge

【4G LTE network】This senior 4G basic cell phone , Compatible with T-Mobile(Prepaid Plan), MetroPCS, Tello Mobile, Ultra Mobile, SpeedTalk, Simple Mobile, Mint Mobile, Red Pocket(GSMT) and any other carriers that using T-Mobile service; NOT work with CDMA Carriers (Verizon, Sprint, Boost, PagePlus) or AT&T.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Pre purchase instructions How to Use A New SIM Card on Our Phone: If you already have an activated sim card, please directly insert to our phone and you are all set. If you are activating new sim card, please provide the IMEI number of your old phone or a smart phone to get the sim card activated. Then put the sim card back to our phone. It will automatically pick up the carrier's network after turning onCompatible Carriers: T-Mobile (Prepaid plan)SpeedTalk (Included in the Package): minimum cost only 5 USD per month, option for Port-in(Keep) your existing phone number or get a new phone number.Tello MobileUltra MobileMetro by T-mobileMint MobileRed PocketNot work with AT&T, or its MVNO such as Cricket, Pure TalkUSA, Consumer Cellular and H2O, etcNot for Any CDMA Network Carriers: This is a GSM 4G unlocked phone, NOT work with CDMA Carriers like Verizon, Sprint, Boost, PagePlus, U.S.Cellular etc.Please do not activated new sim card on this phone or provide its IMEI numbers since most Carriers only recognize the phones they specify.

Care for Seniors - Easy-To-Use Cell Phone for Elderly Big Buttons Phone with Charging Dock Large screen: 2.4 inch HD landscape screenBig button: big button and number keypadBrand speaker ensures every conversation is loud and clearExternal FM radio: No need headphone, you can enjoy FM radio pleasureSOS button: Press to make an emergency call and send a distress messageBig Font: extra big font is easy to see and check for senior or visually impaired

Embrace Higher Speed 4G Talk with your friends, family. Share your thoughts anytime, any where. Convenient Design for Seniors keypad backlight,comfortable curved back, separate function keys, all made for senior citizens Simple Operation Interface Single grid menu interface, big icon, easy viewing, convenient for seniors or people with poor eyesight.

SOS Button for emergency You can set 5 SOS call numbers. In an emergency, press the SOS button for 3 seconds to dial emergency numbers and send SMS to get immediate help from your family or friends It can be disabled if you don't need External FM Radio Φ20*30 Box amplifying speaker for FM Radio No need headphone, external sound is loud and clear Enjoy FM radio anytime, anywhere Multiple shortcut dialing keys Preset shortcut dialing keys 2-9 for someone you care, After preset the number, you can contact them with one press. 30 Meters Flashlight Press (0) button 3 seconds to turn on/off. Super high brightness- Torch up to 30 meters for using in the dark. Convenient for elderly people when they get up during the night.

Specifications Cellular Technology4G LTE, 3G WCDMA, 2G GSM Bands: LTE:B2/B4/B5/B7/B12/B17/866, WCDMA: B2/B5, GSM: 900/850/1900 Screen Size:2.4 inches true landscape screen Camera:0.3MP rear camera Talk Time &Standby Time:5 hours & 100 hours Speaker & Receiver:AAC 20*30 Box Speaker & AAC Receiver Sim Card & SD Card: 1* Nano size sim card , Support up to 32G Micro SD card(Not include) Bluetooth:Bluetooth V5.0 Wifi:Not available Blacklist & Whitelist:Available Phonebook Capacity:500 Contacts Phone Size:4.82*2.25*0.56inch Charging Port & Audio Jack:Micro USB 2.0 & 3.5mm LanguagesEnglish,French,Portuguese,Spanish,Italian,Deutsch Accessories: Speedtalk SIM Card*1, Battery*1, Charging Cable*1, Charging Dock*1, User Manual*1

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 12, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Easy to use
reviews.reviewText: I recently purchased the Senior Cell Phone with Charging Dock for my grandfather and I am extremely happy with my decision. The big buttons and easy-to-use interface make it the perfect phone for elderly users. The SOS calling feature provides peace of mind, knowing that my grandfather can quickly and easily call for help if needed. The type-C charging dock is a great bonus and makes it easy for my grandfather to keep the phone charged and ready to use. The fact that the phone is unlocked allows us to choose a cell phone provider that best fits my grandfather's needs. The phone is durable, reliable and just what my grandfather needed. Overall, I highly recommend this product to anyone looking for a simple and user-friendly cell phone for their elderly loved ones.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 5, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap Quality, poorly designed software, and in the end, didn't even work
reviews.reviewText: I rarely write product reviews , but this product inspired me to. (I despired a word?) Right out of the box this phone felt cheap. Removing the back to get to the battery and Sim card confirmed it. Every single time I removed the back I thought I was going to break it. It was just a matter of time. Which would be fine if you only have to remove the back once in a while, but I had to remove it dozens of times in the first few hours of use. The instructions are horrible, but I managed to get it working. It worked for exactly 4 phone calls and then the screen said, "Emergency Calls Only" every time I tried to make a call. I figured that the card had to be reset or that I had to disconnect the battery to reset the phone (power cycling did nothing.) After popping the back off, again and again, I would manage to get it working, and then I would set it in the charger. A few hours later it would only allow emergency calls again. This happened every time I reset it. As for seniors? It's not nearly as simple as it could be. I could figure out how to use it, but my father struggled even though he did fine with the competition's phone that I eventually ended up getting him. If the phone worked I would give it 2 stars, but it didn't so I give it 1.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great sound and ring
reviews.reviewText: This plastic phone is lightweight and may feel a bit flimsy. Got it an 85 yr old totally not tech savvy with Alzheimer’s. He likes it but gets confused with how to turn it on and off. It is the same button that you use to hang up and if you press it a tad too long it turns off the phone. It would’ve been better if it had a different button for turning it on and off. Other than that the phone works great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The device worked great

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Phone has alot of defects . It did not work
reviews.reviewText: Total failure. That cell phone asked for a password so I could make phone calls. I couldn't when, and where, to input that password. The flip-out page didn't tell me where, or when, to enter that password. The information I got from Amazon.com's catalog entry for this phone said I could use T-mobile. I set up the phone with a T-mobile cell phone calling plan. 2 T-mobile workers installed a SIM card for their calling plans. The T-mobile workers at the sale point couldn't figure out how to get the password into the phone in order to make phone calls. The store personnel told me that phone was unable to process cell phone tower signals ( those workers suspect that this phone has a defective computer program ) . I'll be returning that phone. I want my 90 or so dollars returned for phone, tax, handling, express shipping.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Entirely too small for an elderly person
reviews.reviewText: This phone looked perfect online for my 83y/o mother. But when received and my mother tried to use it... Epic fail!!! The phone was too small for her hands and difficult forher to handle!...The number keys was on point but Very disappointed in the size of the phone! Darn it!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 25, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 2.0 out of 5 stars Does not work with Tello....IMEI is rejected
reviews.reviewText: Purchased in June works Great, liked featers and phone......... reordered, IMEI "won't work", Amazon replaced, replacement IMEI "won't Work"

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 23, 2020
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best Easy Phone for Seniors
reviews.reviewText: My mom is getting up in years and when it's time for her to get a new phone she always wants a phone that's very simple for her to use. I found it in this phone. It's loud ringer and loud volume to hear is a great plus not to mention the large buttons. She mentioned to me that she'd like the the cord that comes with, to hang around your neck so you can carry it. It makes it much easier for her to remember where it's at. I did have a glitch with the original purchase of the phone. But I contacted the company and they contact me right away. They replaced her phone right away. They have excellent customer service and kept in touch with me until my issue was resolved. Now Mama is very happy with her new phone....

Very basic phone, my senior mom loves it. Had to return the first one as we could ot hear her unless she was yelling directly into the mic. However the second one is loud and clear. My only dislike is the back is difficult to get off to put in a SIM card and mini SD card (read the instructions on how to install SD, srsly). The SOS button is great. Mother is 100% happy with it.

reviews.reviewTitle: This phone is dead in less than 8 months of use
reviews.reviewText: Product arrived on time, packaged nicely. Installation was easy. However, the phone stopped working in less than 8 months. Has gone completely dead. I have contacted the seller and I'm waiting for a reply. This review will be updated once the seller reaches out to me with possible solution.

I love the look and feel of this phone, but that is it.It is supposed to be simple, but everything is a pain in the butt.After wasting my time with this (plus another similar phone from another maker before this, which I have extensively reviewed), I do not have enough patience to elaborate. I am just going to get a real phone from a real company.If you ONLY need to make phone calls, and you can remember all of your friends' phone numbers (like we used to in the 80's) or always flip through a phone book, this phone might be awesome.These are my thoughts after having this for a few weeks. I am glad that this phone is working out for others.

reviews.reviewTitle: Was a week late in delivery
reviews.reviewText: Tracking kept saying it would be delivered on a particular day and didn't change until the day of. So far the phone is good and easy to use
